Subject: Soon, the two students will be trained

Vulois turns to Child.

"Here you will learn exactly how special you are. How you have been 
chosen. How you have powers, that other bots could only dream of. I 
will teach you to control that power. Once you have mind over matter, 
you can do anything. But you have to take a solemn oath. You must 
always use these powers for peace, and never for war."

He turns to Herald.

"Come. I will you the quick tour and then you may go. After that, I 
will take Child to meet Windrazor, and train him. But before we go, I 
would like to offer a permanent alliance between our groupes. This is 
not a joining, just an alliance. If you need any help, you may always 
count on us. We will always take you in. We have me, and Battera, and 
Cybershark, and Windrzor, and The Peace Angels. So anytime you need 
help, we would all gladly give it to you. Now come, let's start the 
tour."
